name: PBProbe
short_description:
PBProbe: A Link Capacity Estimation Tool for High Speed Links

[NEW] PBProbe_3.0.1: (2013/10/14)
Release Note:
https://sourceforge.net/p/pbprobe/blog/2013/01/release-note-pbprobev30/

For more information:
http://www.iis.sinica.edu.tw/~cclljj/publication/2008/08_J_ComCom-PBProbe.pdf
http://www.iis.sinica.edu.tw/~cclljj/publication/2004/04_SIGCOMM_CapProbe.pdf
==================================================

FAQ:
http://sourceforge.net/p/pbprobe/wiki/FAQ/

At Server:  ./pbprobe_server
At Client:   ./pbprobe_client -s <Server_IP>

At Server side, you just need to run it once, and it will handle the connection from client and log the result.

At Client side, when the experiment is finish, it will return the results about download link and upload link between client and server.

For more information, please read the README doc.
 
**PBProbe_2.0.1:  Update the Release License. (2012/10/24)
summary: PBProbe: A Link Capacity Estimation Tool for High Speed Links
